person.persName: Thomas M. Rouse (Pendleton County, Kentucky, merchant)

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Married to Eliza B. Hymer Rouse on February 14, 1855. Father of James M. Rouse, Missouri E. Rouse, and Ada Rouse. Blacksmith in Kenton County in 1855. Farmer in Kenton County in 1860. Merchant in Pendleton County, Kentucky, in 1863. Postmaster of De Mossville, Kentucky, from 1865 to 1867.
